Wacky Mart (China) — 2025-06-12; CNY 199; reg-cn expected   # QUERY LOG (abridged)

identity_taxonomy: Multiple variants themed after snack/drink brands (e.g., soda can Labubu, instant noodle Labubu). Each variant resembles a popular convenience item.
packaging & inbox contents: Launch: 12 June 2025 through 7 September 2025. Exclusive to China pop-up events in Shanghai, Beijing, Guangzhou, and Chengdu[^6_6].
edition_run_info: Retail: CNY 199 per unit. Secondary-market premiums minimal (~20–50%) due to multi-city run.
regional_policy: Convenience store-themed packaging resembling snack boxes; includes collectible receipt-style authentication card.
market listings per regionchannel: THE MONSTERS IP with Wacky Mart event branding; partnership with local snack brands for thematic authenticity.
blindbox specifics if relevant: Polyester plush with PVC face plates; ABS keychain hardware. Manufactured in China with event-specific molds.
compliance_safety: Instagram announcement posts, TikTok event previews, local influencer pop-up visits documented[^6_6][^6_7][^6_8].
commerce & logistics adjuncts: Strong foot-traffic turnout; positive reviews on interactive event setup; some queues reported due to limited daily supply.
Name: Wacky Mart (China) — 2025-06-12 — CNY 199 — pop-up store exclusive
